titles.title: Remote Seafood Employee Meals Tax Parity Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the 50 percent limitation on the deduction for meal expenses does not apply to meals provided on certain fishing boats or at certain fish processing facilities.
Remote Seafood Employee Meals Tax Parity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Remote Seafood Employee Meals Tax Parity Act
This bill provides that the 50% limitation on the tax deduction for business meals shall not apply to meals provided on certain fishing vessels or at certain fish processing facilities.
